column1: Baby Barnaby's////Went to Baby Barnaby's for the first time a couple weeks ago with my boyfriend. I love breakfast food and trying new foods... him not so much in trying new anything. I convinced him to go and was a little skeptical when we had to sign in on a notepad and wait outside. We waited about 20 min then got seated. The service was awesome
column3: and the serving size was more than enough for us. He got steak and eggs
column5: it was all delicious! AND my boyfriend said it's his new favorite spot for breakfast
